description.en: Climb Willyrex’s Parkour Tower and prove, jump by jump, your true skill.

longDescription.en:
Before you rises a tower that seems to stretch endlessly upward, distilling both the pressure and the reward of parkour.
Its design plays with pure verticality: every block dares you to risk, every brief pause seeds doubt.
There are no distractions—just open air around you and the certainty that one misstep sends you back to the start.
Sections shift pace without warning, forcing you to recalibrate reflexes and timing on the fly.
Difficulty grows subtly yet relentlessly, turning the climb into a battle against your own patience.
Fans of Willyrex will sense echoes of his competitive spirit, though the map never reveals all its secrets.
Those who reach the summit claim a victory that speaks more about the player than about the game.

description.en: Fight bandits in the desert tombs.

longDescription.en: Venture into forgotten tombs, survive raids from desert bandits, and uncover ancient relics in this expansive desert map.

Leap across sky bridges, uncover secrets hidden among the clouds, and explore massive floating islands in this vertical challenge map. Traverse intricate networks of aerial paths suspended high above the void, each leading to unique biomes and mysterious ancient ruins waiting to be discovered. As you ascend through levels of increasing difficulty, you'll face environmental puzzles, hidden switches, and parkour segments that will test your skill and precision. Whether you're adventuring solo or with friends, Sky Islands offers a stunning backdrop for exploration, storytelling, and high-stakes survival. The ever-present danger of falling adds tension to every step — only the most agile players will reach the highest peaks and uncover all its hidden lore.
Navigate dense jungle terrain, solve puzzles, and escape ancient traps while trying to survive in this thrilling escape map.
Delve into freezing caves, uncover lost civilizations, and experience the chill of the unknown in this atmospheric cold biome map.
Face flame guardians, solve fire puzzles, and conquer the burning throne of a forgotten citadel in this intense combat map.
